page.title: 04Culcheth's Churches
page.content: We have got three Churches in our village.One is an Independent Church.One is a Methodist Church and one is a Parish Church. I go to the Parish Church because I think it is more beautiful, I am in the Choir. The Methodist Church is more modern but not as beautiful.I have never been to the other Church so I don't know what it is like inside, all I know is that it is small.I like the service in the Parish Church very much. { } There are Sunday Schools at most of these Churches. There is one at the Parish Church organised during church services.The young children go to another room just before the Sermon and come back at the end of the service. { { Victoria Little}
